summary: Dual casting is rebalanced to make it a viable option at lower levels, while not always the best option. reduced cost and power.
descriptionHtml:
Dual casting has been rebalanced to:
<br /><br />Dcast cost: 0.50000
<br /><br />Dcast power and duration: 0.75000
<br /><br />
<br /><br />Ergo it is a way for low level mages to spam spells or cast more powerful spells while retaining some balance.
<br /><br />
author: chimeric929
